title: No second chance huh?
content: Even if u fuck up one sem it's a goner right? No hopes at all. I am in the lesser part of 7 GPA rn and 2nd sem. I am an average student but really see no hope at all rn. It's gone. Good grades are a dream.

comments.body: Some people make a comeback in 2nd year with cs subjects so still there is a chance and u haven't even given one isa and esa for 2nd sem so why lose hope

I am not going to sugarcoat it but you do realise the fact that you brought this upon yourself, right? The only thing that you can do is to just do your best in the upcoming exams. Also pls don't be so hard on yourself ffsüôè
I do realize but my fucking dopamine addicted brain can't get off the phone. Idk wt to do. Feel like walking away from everything
Just imagine what's gonna happen if you continue to be like this and then the results don't turn out to be the way you wanted. Wakeup call hai bhai, padhai chalu kardo

I happen to be an average student as well, in my 8th semester. I started off with a GPA in the low 7's and now I currently sit at mid 8 CGPA. It's definitely possible to turn things around for the better, if you just put in a lot more effort than you did in the past 2 semesters. Don't beat yourself up over what's done already, focus on improving yourself to make sure you don't repeat the same mistakes again.
Can I make a comeback for isa 2 and esa? With remaining time?
